text: The Lords and Ladies, then you'll be able to walk that quietly.

passages.fragment: Lords and Ladies , then you 'll be
passages.full_quote: But if you stay here and keep trying to call the... <used>Lords and Ladies, then you'll be</used> up against me again
"And <used>then you'll be able to</used> ride away...?"
One day, Rob thought, they<used>'ll be able to walk</used> up to even the longest words and give them a good kicking

passages.fragment: be able to walk that quietly
passages.full_quote: And no one that big ought to <used>be able to walk that quietly</used>
